task_summary: Navigate around obstacle and reach the blue pen on the table.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a robot arm that must locate and approach a blue pen placed behind a set of books on a desk. The books act as an obstacle, requiring the robot to perceive the environment, plan a path that avoids the obstruction, and move to a pregrasp pose before finally reaching the blue pen. Accurate perception and collision-free motion are necessary to complete the task successfully.
preconditions: Robot is positioned at start location
Blue pen is visible and stationary on the table
Obstacle (books) is present between the robot and the pen
stepwise_plan: Check for visibility of the blue pen
If not visible, scan to find the pen
Detect and confirm location of the blue pen
Move to a pregrasp position that avoids the books
Verify robot is at the pregrasp pose
Move directly to the blue pen
Verify arrival at the blue pen
success_criteria: Robot successfully reaches the blue pen without contacting the books
Final pose is at the blue pen
failure_and_recovery: Failure to detect blue pen: repeat scan up to 3 attempts
Collision risk: approach is split into pregrasp & final approach
task_long_description.termination: Task completes when the robot is at the blue pen having avoided the obstacle.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the blue pen

node_specs.description: Checks if the blue pen is visible
Scans for the blue pen in the scene if not immediately visible
Detects and locates the blue pen
Moves to a pregrasp position to prepare for final approach avoiding obstacles
Checks if the robot has reached the pregrasp position
Moves from pregrasp pose to the blue pen
Checks if the robot has reached the blue pen

failure_modes: Blue pen not visible due to occlusion
Scan fails to locate pen within number of attempts
Pose not reached due to motion/kinematics error
recovery_strategy: Retry scan up to 3 times to locate blue pen
Splitting approach into pregrasp and final approach steps to avoid collision
assumptions: Frames show the robot arm navigating around books to reach a blue pen in the corner
No explicit grasp or manipulation occurs; only contactless approach
No force or grasp parameters required by instruction or frames

expected_success_criteria: Robot reaches blue pen position without contacting obstacle
